name: xaddcomd
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cxad, c1), co(c1, cxad, c0)))

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(c0, cxad, c1), co(c1, cxad, c0)), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cxad, c1), co(c1, cxad, c0)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cxr))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wceq(co(c0, cxad, c1), co(c1, cxad, c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cxad, c1), co(c1, cxad, c0)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cxr))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wceq(co(c0, cxad, c1), co(c1, cxad, c0)))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wceq(co(c0, cxad, c1), co(c1, cxad, c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cxad, c1), co(c1, cxad, c0)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cxr))

comment: The extended real addition operation is commutative. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
